title: Why are people still building Statikk Shiv?
body:
there's now a 15% crit chance gap for 300 gold, as is 10% attack speed, and the ability to ignore minions and your own teammates, which is important for dodging skillshots.
Yeah statikk has better burst and marginal waveclear that falls off at the 30 minute mark, but whats the point if your dps compared to the enemy adc is gobshite?
